name: dspy-skills
description: Collection of skills for DSPy framework - program language models, optimize prompts, and build RAG pipelines systematically.

plugins.name: dspy-rag-pipeline
plugins.description: Build and optimize RAG pipelines with ColBERTv2 retrieval in DSPy

plugins.description: Bootstrap few-shot examples for DSPy prompt optimization

plugins.description: Comprehensive evaluation framework for DSPy programs

plugins.description: Fine-tune language models using bootstrapped DSPy examples

plugins.name: dspy-gepa-reflective
plugins.description: Generalized Error-driven Prompt Adaptation with reflection

plugins.name: dspy-haystack-integration
plugins.description: Integrate DSPy with Haystack for advanced NLP pipelines

plugins.name: dspy-miprov2-optimizer
plugins.description: MIPROv2 optimizer for automatic prompt engineering

plugins.description: Design and optimize DSPy signatures for language model programs
